ghastly.core¶

class ghastly.core.AnnConeCore(r_out_up, r_in_up, r_out_low, r_in_low, *args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: Core

Class for an annular right truncated cone, with its centerline parallel to the z-axis

class ghastly.core.AnnularCore(r_outer, r_inner, *args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: Core

Class for an annularly shaped core region, with its axis parallel to the z-axis.

class ghastly.core.ConeCore(r_upper, r_lower, *args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: Core

Class for a right truncated cone, such as those found in discharge chutes. The central axis is parallel to the z-axis.

class ghastly.core.Core(x_c, y_c, z_max, z_min, regions=[], open_bottom='open 1', open_top='open 2')¶

Bases: object

Parent class for Core objects. Because the Core class doesn’t define a specific geometry, the Core class should not be used directly.

class ghastly.core.CylCore(r, *args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: Core

Class for a cylindrically shaped core section, with its axis parallel to the z-axis.
